original: Asubhe, bhikkhave, subhanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.

cattāro me bhikkhave na saññā vipallāsāḥ na citta vipallāsāḥ na diṭṭhi vipallāsāḥ

original: Anicce, bhikkhave, aniccanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.

original: Dukkhe, bhikkhave, dukkhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
analyzed: dukkhe bhikkhave dukkhanti na saññā vipallāsaḥ na citta vipallāsaḥ na diṭṭhi vipallāsaḥ

original: Anattani, bhikkhave, anattāti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
analyzed: anattani bhikkhave anattā ti na saññā vipallāsaḥ na citta vipallāsaḥ na diṭṭhi vipallāsaḥ

original: Asubhe, bhikkhave, asubhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
analyzed: asubhe bhikkhave asubham ti na saññā vipallāsaḥ na citta vipallāsaḥ na diṭṭhi vipallāsaḥ

analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave cattāro na saññā vipallāsā na citta vipallāsā na diṭṭhi vipallāsā ti

original: Ime cattāro vipallāsā diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā, appahīnāti.
analyzed: ime cattāro vipallāsā diṭṭhi sampannassa puggalassa pahīnāḥ appahīnā ati

original: Anicce niccanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
analyzed: anicce niccanti saññā vipallāso citta vipallāso diṭṭhi vipallāso pahīno

original: Dukkhe sukhanti saññā uppajjati, cittaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
analyzed: dukkhe sukhanti saññā uppajjati cittam uppajjati diṭṭhi vipallāsaḥ pahīno

original: Anattani attāti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
analyzed: an attani attā iti saññā vipallāso citta vipallāso diṭṭhi vipallāso pahīno

original: Asubhe subhanti saññā uppajjati, cittaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
analyzed: asubhe subhanti saññā uppajjati cittam uppajjati diṭṭhi vipallāsaḥ pahīno

original: Dvīsu vatthūsu dve vipallāsā pahīnā, cattāro vipallāsā appahīnā.
